body:
Comment 15: 
The current godoc embeds everything it needs into the binary, so
if your godoc complains that it couldn't find something under
$GOROOT/lib/godoc then you're running an older version.

Please note that go get code.google.com/p/go.tools/cmd/godoc
will install the godoc binary to $GOROOT/bin, not $GOPATH/bin
as it might be expected from that command.
